merge-world.title: Merge World
merge-world.description: Merge World is an awesome merge game that lets you shape a vibrant world to your liking. Combine materials to create larger structures and expand your domain with imaginative constructions. Friendly fairies lend their magic to help you design and develop your very own paradise. Relax as you strategize, merge, and watch your world come to life, one step at a time.

HomeIframe.title: Merge World - The Ultimate Merge Game
HomeIframe.description: Dive into Merge World, a soothing merge game powered by HTML5, perfect for creative and peaceful gameplay. Play unblocked and for free on any modern browser.

HomeFeatures.whatIsDescription: Merge World is a soothing merge game that lets you shape a vibrant world to your liking. Combine materials to create larger structures and expand your domain with imaginative constructions.
HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep1: Use the mouse to select and merge items.
HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep2: Combine materials to create larger structures.
HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep3: Expand your domain with imaginative constructions and watch your world come to life.
HomeFeatures.feature1Description: Unleash your creativity by merging items to build your unique world.
HomeFeatures.feature2Description: Enjoy a peaceful and relaxing game environment.
HomeFeatures.feature3Description: Get magical assistance from friendly fairies to enhance your constructions.
HomeFeatures.feature4Description: Experience fast and smooth gameplay on any modern browser.
